Posts.Content: Hope you are doing better. I am new to all this since my diagnosis on July 24. It's hell.

Posts.Content: You sound like me. i had surgery last Thursday and am waiting on pathology. The wait is the hardest.

Posts.Content: Just waiting on pathology report. Had lumpectomy, sentinel node biopsy and bilateral reduction last Thursday. Don't really know how to use this site.
